name: Earthlock: Festival of Magic (Wii U, PS4, XBO, PC & Mac)
blurb: An original turn-based role-playing game set in a world of machines and magic, a world that stopped spinning thousands of years ago.

rewards.reward: No Reward

BACKER
********************************************
Stay Informed + Forum Access
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You have our deepest thanks for supporting us and you will receive all future updates from this campaign and access to our backer only forum.

EARLY SUPPORTER
******************************************** 
BACKER Tier + Digital copy of the game (Platform of choice) + Beta Invite + Supporter Credit
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You’ll receive a digital copy of the game for the platform of your choice. Invite to the Beta testing to help the development. Credited as Supporter in the end credits of the game.

SUPPORTER
********************************************  
BACKER Tier + Digital copy of the game (Platform of choice) + Beta Invite + Supporter Credit
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You’ll receive a digital copy of the game for the platform of your choice. Invite to the Beta testing to help the development. Access to the backer only forum. Exclusive Forum Badge. Credited as Supporter in the end credits in the  game.

LIMITED SOUNDTRACK
******************************************** 
SUPPORTER Tier + Digital Soundtrack + Digital World Map + Digital Poster + Pre-release
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Digital download of the soundtrack for the game. Digital World Map and Digital Poster as High Res Wallpaper. Access to the Pre-release of the game on Steam (only by choosing Steam as your platform).

SOUNDTRACK
******************************************** 
SUPPORTER Tier + Digital Soundtrack + Digital World Map + Digital Poster + Pre-release
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Digital download of the soundtrack for the game. Digital World Map and Digital Poster as High Res Wallpaper. Access to the Pre-release of the game on Steam (only by choosing Steam as your platform).

BASIC ALPHA\r\n******************************************** SUPPORTER Tier + Alpha Invite ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\nYou will receive an Invite to the Alpha test to help with the development at an early stage. This is for you who want to help test the game but might not be interested in all the other stuff.

LIMITED ART BOOK ******************************************** SOUNDTRACK Tier + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Weapon ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Digital downloadable Art of Earthlock book detailing the creation of the game world. Exclusive in-game weapon.

ART BOOK
******************************************** 
SOUNDTRACK Tier + Digital Art Book + Exclusive Weapon
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Digital downloadable Art of Earthlock book detailing the creation of the game world. Exclusive in-game weapon.

COMIC BOOK
********************************************
ART BOOK Tier + Digital Comic + Vehicle Skin
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Digitial download of the Earthlock comic book which gives more insight into the backstory of some of the main characters. Exclusive Vehicle Skin for the overworld to travel around in style.

ALPHA DOG
********************************************
COMIC BOOK Tier + Alpha Access + Digital 3D model of Amon or Ive ready for 3D printing. + Character Skins. +  1x extra game copy (Total: 2)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Digital 3D model file of Amon or Ive that is made ready for 3D printing. You can print it at a printer of your choice (cost not included). Exclusive character skins for Amon and Ive. Invite to the Alpha testing to help the development in the early stages. 1 x Additional copy of the game for a total of 2 copies.

EARLY EARTHLOCK SEQUELS ******************************************** ALPHA DOG Tier + Earthlock Volume 2 + Earthlock Volume 3 + 1 extra game copy of Volume 1 (Total: 3) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Digital copy of Earthlock: Volume 2 and Earthlock: Volume 3. 1 x additional copy of the game for a total of 3 copies.

EARTHLOCK SEQUELS
******************************************** 
ALPHA DOG Tier + Earthlock Volume 2 + Earthlock Volume 3 + 1 extra game copy of Volume 1 (Total: 3)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Digital copy of Earthlock: Volume 2 and Earthlock: Volume 3. 1 x additional copy of the game for a total of 3 copies.

FLASH DRIVE ******************************************** EARTHLOCK SEQUELSE Tier + 1x Flash Drive ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ One Custom USB Flash Drive with DRM free copy of the game preloaded. (International shipping included). All creative tiers also include this tier.

OBJECT DESIGNER (Creative Tier) ******************************************** EARTHLOCK SEQUELS Tier + Design an Object + 1x extra game copy (Total: 4) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ We will send you a design document to fill out for an object for the game. We will create your personally designed object or prop and add it to the game where suited. 1 x Additional copy of the game for a total of 4 copies.

PLANT DESIGNER (Creative Tier)
********************************************
EARTHLOCK SEQUELS Tier + Design a Plant + 1x extra game copy (Total: 4)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
We will send you a design document to fill out for a spud plant. We will create your personally designed plant as one you can use in the game. 1 x Additional copy of the game for a total of 4 copies.

WEAPON DESIGNER (Creative Tier)
********************************************
EARTHLOCK SEQUELS Tier + Design a Weapon + 1x extra game copy (Total: 4)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
We will send you a design document to fill out for a weapon. We will create your personally designed weapon as one you can use in the game. 1 x Additional copy of the game for a total of 4 copies.

MONSTER DESIGNER (Creative Tier)
*******************************************
EARTHLOCK SEQUELS Tier + Design a Monster + 1x extra game copy (Total: 4)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
We will send you a design document to fill out for an in game Monster. We will create your personally designed monster as one you can fight in the game. 1 x Additional copy of the game for a total of 4 copies.

NPC DESIGNER (Creative Tier)
******************************************** 
EARTHLOCK SEQUELS Tier + Design an NPC + 2x extra game copies (Total: 5)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
We will send you a design document to fill out for an in game character. We will create your personally designed character as one you can encounter in the game. 2 x Additional copies of the game for a total of 5 copies.

ASSOCIATE PRODUCER (Producer Tier)
********************************************
All Creative Tiers + 1x Physical Statuette + 5x extra game copies (Total: 10).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
One 8” (20cm) 3D statuette of the main character of your choosing. + Associate Producer Title in the credits. + Invite to our launch party here in Oslo (Travel and accommodation not included) + 5 x Additional copies of the game for a total of 10 copies.

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER (Producer Tier)
******************************************** 
All Creative Tiers + 2x Physical Statuettes + Credited as Executive Producer + Launch Party Invite. +5x extra game copies (Total: 10).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Two 8” (20cm) 3D statuettes of the main characters of your choosing. + Executive Producer title in the credits. + Invite to our launch party here in Oslo (Travel and accommodation not included). + 5 x Additional copies of the game for a total of 10 copies.

CO PRODUCER (Producer Tier)
********************************************
All Creative Tiers + 3x Physical Statuettes + Credited as Co-Producer. + Launch Party Invite. + 5x extra game copies (Total: 10)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Three 8” (20cm) 3D statuettes of the main characters of your choosing. + Co-Producer title in the credits. + Invite to our launch party here in Oslo (Travel and accommodation not included). + 5 x Additional copies of the game for a total of 10 copies.
